content: Vadim Shcherbakov - Royal Holloway Research Portal Vadim Shcherbakov Dr Reader, Department of Mathematics https://orcid.org/0000-0001-9175-5238 Phone+44 1784 276528EmailVadim.Shcherbakovrhul.acuk TW20 0EX Personal profile Research interestsMy research is in the area of  probability, stochastic processes and their applications. My current research mainly concerns the long term behaviour of Markov  processes with interaction, such as interacting birth-and-death processes, competition processes and growth processes with graph-based interaction. I am also interested in applications of probability to finance. Educational backgroundMSc  and PhD (Faculty of Mechanics and Mathematics, Moscow State University) Expertise related to UN Sustainable Development Goals In 2015, UN member states agreed to 17 global Sustainable Development Goals (SDGs) to end poverty, protect the planet and ensure prosperity for all.
